metadataAttributes.Title: Uncommon Sense Teaching
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Do your students spend too much (or too little) time learning, with disappointing results?  Do they procrastinate in their study because it’s boring and they’re easily distracted? Are you working to make your teaching even more inclusive? Uncommon Sense Teaching will give you practical new insights that will help you solve these goals and challenges, and many more.
